name: The Inheritors of the New World
detailed_description:
"Inheritors" is a about Ursula Schneider's (our female protagonist) quest to survive and build a better life for herself, her siblings, and her friends, in a post-apocalyptic world. Ursula has managed to survive as a refugee soldier on the outskirts of The City for some time now, trying to provide a life for her only two remaining relatives, her siblings. But one day, after a close encounter with death on a patrol mission to the Yellow Zone, she decides to abandon her former reservations, and become an Acolyte of Lust, a sacred prostitute, since this is the only way she and her siblings can gain access to the Holy City, the Last City, the City of the Inheritors of the New World.

This a (mostly) light-hearted and very erotic story about the adventures of Ursula and her friends, as they use pleasure, violence, biotech, and faith in order to build a place for themselves inside a strange new City.

Features
Over 50 sex scenes!
Many different costumes and transformations, both for Ursula and for her 3 playable friends!
3 different Sex Affinities to choose, with additional scenes for each!


Difficulties
Normal mode: A fairly balanced mode, standard for rpg players
Casual mode: For those who just want to get to the "plot" as soon as possible!


Controls
Inheritors can be played using keyboard only, mouse plus keyboard.
However, it is recommended that you have access to a keyboard during the sex scenes for the keyboard-only functions.


Disclaimer
All characters involved in any sexual act in Inheritors of the New World are over 18 years old.
